meanings.definition: A board used for attaching tags or labels.
meanings.sent1: I hung the tagboards on the wall to display the different prices.
meanings.sent2: The store owner organized the merchandise using tagboards.
meanings.sent3: The tagboards decided to go on strike until they were given a break from holding tags.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a cluttered tagboard, filled with memories and reminders.
meanings.sent5: The bright red tagboards stood out against the white background, making them easy to spot.

meanings.definition: The act of tagging or labeling something.
meanings.sent1: His job at the warehouse involved a lot of tagboards.
meanings.sent2: Tagboards help keep items organized and easy to find.
meanings.sent3: The tagboards at the office party were quite the chatterboxes, sharing gossip all night.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a burst of colorful tagboards, spreading joy everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The tagboards fluttered in the wind, creating a mesmerizing display of information.

meanings.definition: A group of tags or labels attached to a board.
meanings.sent1: The tagboards on the bulletin board were filled with announcements.
meanings.sent2: She carefully arranged the tagboards to create an eye-catching display.
meanings.sent3: The tagboards at the meeting seemed to have a mind of their own, rearranging themselves mysteriously.
meanings.sent4: The tagboards formed a colorful mosaic, each one telling a different story.
meanings.sent5: The tagboards fluttered like butterflies, each one carrying a message of its own.
